attributes.action: to apologize to the people of Northern Ireland (past and present)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
for the failure of successive United Kingdom governments that failed to ensure that the rights (available to other United Kingdom citzens) were not available to citizens of Northern Ireland.

It is a failure of successive UK goernments to ensure that the rights of all UK citizens were upheld

rejection.details: This is an opinion stated as fact. Please provide evidence of the particular rights you believe have not been provided to NI residents.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
